name: quadstore-comunica
description: SPARQL query engine for quadstore, built on the Comunica framework

scripts.build:cjs-bundle-rename-vars: mv dist/cjs/bundle.js b.js && sed -e 's/__WEBPACK_/__QUADSTORE_COMUNICA_/g' -e 's/__webpack_/__quadstore_comunica_/g' b.js > dist/cjs/bundle.js && rm b.js
scripts.build:cjs: npm run build:cjs-bundle && npm run build:cjs-bundle-rename-vars && npm run build:cjs-types
scripts.build:esm-bundle-rename-vars: mv dist/esm/bundle.js b.js && sed -e 's/__WEBPACK_/__QUADSTORE_COMUNICA_/g' -e 's/__webpack_/__quadstore_comunica_/g' b.js > dist/esm/bundle.js && rm b.js
scripts.build:esm: npm run build:esm-bundle && npm run build:esm-bundle-rename-vars && npm run build:esm-types
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.publish:beta: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish --tag beta

author: Jacopo Scazzosi <jacopo@scazzosi.com>
